column3: This runs fine on my local pc but something is causing the tests to hang on Travis. I've pushed a temporary commit to increase travis logging.
Concept ACK, though I'm also puzzled by the travis failures.
930deb9b2c5a8234d430f0a739c97e1fc961ffad passes travis (at least on my fork). I think the earlier failure was perhaps spurious.\n\nThis should now be ready for review.
This is info elsewhere, should it really be warning?

Yes - this log is replacing the logs in the individual test cases (rpcbind_test.py and zmq_test.py), which are currently warnings.\n\nThe reason is that we always want the user to know if a test has been skipped.
OK, I see. I thought the log.info below was also logging something similar. This is fine.
